properties.entry: SELECT H.HR_ID , H.HR_PWD , H.HR_NAME , H.HR_PHONE , H.HR_EMAIL , H.B_CODE , B.B_BLOCK , D.D_LIST_REASON , B.B_NAME , B.B_NUMBER FROM HR H JOIN BUSINESS B ON (H.B_CODE = B.B_CODE) JOIN DECISION_LIST D ON (B.D_LIST_CODE = D.D_LIST_CODE) WHERE H.HR_ID = ?
INSERT INTO DECISION_LIST ( D_LIST_REASON , D_LIST_DATE , ADMIN_ID , DECISION_CODE , D_LIST_TYPE_CODE ) VALUES ( NULL , NULL , NULL , 1 , 3 )

INSERT INTO BUSINESS ( B_NAME , B_OWNER , B_NUMBER , B_ADDRESS , B_PHONE , B_BLOCK , B_PROFIT , B_LOGO , B_CATEGORY_CODE , D_LIST_CODE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 0 , ? , ? , ? , LAST_INSERT_ID() )
INSERT INTO HR ( HR_ID , HR_PWD , HR_NAME , HR_PHONE , HR_EMAIL , B_CODE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , LAST_INSERT_ID() )

SELECT c.DECISION_CODE , IFNULL(COUNT(a.POST_CODE), 0) as 'COUNT' FROM POST a JOIN DECISION_LIST b ON(a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE) JOIN DECISION c ON(b.DECISION_CODE = c.DECISION_CODE) WHERE a.HR_ID = ? GROUP BY c.DECISION_CODE ORDER BY c.DECISION_CODE

SELECT a.POST_CODE , c.DECISION_STATUS , a.POST_DATE , a.POST_TITLE , e.AD_NAME , a.POST_START , a.POST_END , COUNT(ap.APPLY_CODE) as "APPLICANTS" FROM POST a LEFT JOIN APPLY ap ON(a.POST_CODE = ap.POST_CODE) LEFT JOIN DECISION_LIST b ON(a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE) LEFT JOIN DECISION c ON(b.DECISION_CODE = c.DECISION_CODE) LEFT JOIN POST_AD_PAYMENT d ON(a.POST_CODE = d.POST_CODE) LEFT JOIN AD e ON(d.AD_CODE = e.AD_CODE) WHERE a.HR_ID = ? GROUP BY a.POST_CODE, c.DECISION_STATUS , a.POST_DATE , a.POST_TITLE , e.AD_NAME ,a.POST_START , a.POST_END ORDER BY a.POST_DATE DESC LIMIT ?, ?

SELECT a.POST_CODE , c.DECISION_STATUS , a.POST_DATE , a.POST_TITLE , e.AD_NAME , a.POST_START , a.POST_END , COUNT(ap.APPLY_CODE) as "APPLICANTS" FROM POST a LEFT JOIN APPLY ap ON(a.POST_CODE = ap.POST_CODE) LEFT JOIN DECISION_LIST b ON(a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE) LEFT JOIN DECISION c ON(b.DECISION_CODE = c.DECISION_CODE) LEFT JOIN POST_AD_PAYMENT d ON(a.POST_CODE = d.POST_CODE) LEFT JOIN AD e ON(d.AD_CODE = e.AD_CODE) WHERE a.HR_ID = ? AND c.DECISION_STATUS = ? GROUP BY a.POST_CODE, c.DECISION_STATUS , a.POST_DATE , a.POST_TITLE , e.AD_NAME ,a.POST_START , a.POST_END ORDER BY a.POST_DATE DESC LIMIT ?, ?

INSERT INTO POST ( POST_TITLE , POST_CONTENT , POST_TO , POST_START , POST_END , POST_ONLINE , POST_DATE , POST_ADDRESS , POST_DAY , PAYMENT , GENDER , ADVANTAGE , BENEFIT , FULLTIME_YN , POST_M_NAME , POST_M_EMAIL , POST_M_PHONE , EXP_CODE , JOB_CODE , PERIOD_CODE , HOUR_CODE , LOCATION_CODE , PAY_CODE , AGE_CODE , HR_ID , DEGREE_CODE , D_LIST_CODE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , NOW() , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , LAST_INSERT_ID() )
SELECT COUNT(HR_ID) FROM HR WHERE HR_ID = ?

SELECT a.POST_CODE , a.POST_M_NAME , a.POST_TITLE , a.POST_TO , a.POST_END , (SELECT COUNT(b.APPLY_CODE) FROM APPLY b WHERE a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE ) as 'countOfApplicant' , (SELECT COUNT(b.APPLY_CODE) FROM APPLY b WHERE a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE AND b.APPLY_READ = false ) as 'unreadResume' FROM POST a JOIN DECISION_LIST c ON(a.D_LIST_CODE = c.D_LIST_CODE) WHERE HR_ID = ? AND c.DECISION_CODE IN (2,3) GROUP BY a.POST_CODE, a.POST_M_NAME, a.POST_TITLE, a.POST_TO, a.POST_END HAVING 0 < (SELECT COUNT(b.APPLY_CODE) FROM APPLY b WHERE a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE ) LIMIT ?, ?
UPDATE HR SET HR_NAME = ?, HR_PHONE = ? , HR_EMAIL = ? WHERE HR_ID = ?

SELECT pap.POST_AD_CODE , p.POST_TITLE , a.AD_NAME , p.POST_DATE , a.AD_PRICE * pap.POST_AD_WEEK , pap.POST_AD_PAID FROM POST_AD_PAYMENT pap JOIN POST p ON (pap.POST_CODE = p.POST_CODE) JOIN AD a ON (pap.AD_CODE = a.AD_CODE) JOIN DECISION_LIST dl ON (p.D_LIST_CODE = dl.D_LIST_CODE) JOIN DECISION d ON (d.DECISION_CODE = dl.DECISION_CODE) WHERE p.HR_ID = ? AND d.DECISION_STATUS = '승인' order by p.POST_DATE desc LIMIT ? , ?

SELECT pap.POST_AD_CODE , p.POST_TITLE , a.AD_NAME , p.POST_DATE , a.AD_PRICE * pap.POST_AD_WEEK , pap.POST_AD_PAID FROM POST_AD_PAYMENT pap JOIN POST p ON (pap.POST_CODE = p.POST_CODE) JOIN AD a ON (pap.AD_CODE = a.AD_CODE) JOIN DECISION_LIST dl ON (p.D_LIST_CODE = dl.D_LIST_CODE) JOIN DECISION d ON (d.DECISION_CODE = dl.DECISION_CODE) WHERE p.HR_ID = ? AND d.DECISION_STATUS = '승인' AND pap.POST_AD_PAID = ? order by p.POST_DATE desc LIMIT ? , ?

SELECT pap.POST_AD_CODE , pap.POST_AD_DATE , pap.P_METHOD_CODE , pap.POST_AD_PAID , a.AD_NAME , pap.POST_AD_WEEK , a.AD_PRICE , a.AD_PRICE * pap.POST_AD_WEEK , p.POST_CODE , p.POST_START , p.POST_END , p.POST_M_NAME FROM POST_AD_PAYMENT pap JOIN POST p ON (pap.POST_CODE = p.POST_CODE) JOIN AD a ON (pap.AD_CODE = a.AD_CODE) JOIN DECISION_LIST dl ON (p.D_LIST_CODE = dl.D_LIST_CODE) JOIN DECISION d ON (dl.DECISION_CODE = d.DECISION_CODE) WHERE p.HR_ID = ? AND pap.POST_AD_CODE = ? AND d.DECISION_STATUS ='승인'

SELECT pap.POST_AD_PAID , IFNULL(COUNT(pap.POST_AD_CODE), 0) as 'COUNT' FROM POST_AD_PAYMENT pap JOIN POST p ON (pap.POST_CODE = p.POST_CODE) JOIN AD a ON (pap.AD_CODE = a.AD_CODE) JOIN DECISION_LIST dl ON (p.D_LIST_CODE = dl.D_LIST_CODE) JOIN DECISION d ON (d.DECISION_CODE = dl.DECISION_CODE) WHERE p.HR_ID = ? AND d.DECISION_STATUS = '승인' group by pap.POST_AD_PAID

SELECT COUNT(a.APPLY_CODE) as "COUNT" FROM APPLY a JOIN POST b ON(a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE) JOIN RESUME c ON(a.RESUME_CODE = c.RESUME_CODE) WHERE a.POST_CODE = ? AND b.HR_ID = ? AND a.APPLY_CANCEL = FALSE;

SELECT a.APPLY_CODE , a.RESUME_CODE , a.POST_CODE , d.USER_NAME , a.APPLY_DATE , a.APPLY_READ , a.APPLY_YN , b.POST_TITLE , b.POST_START , b.POST_END , b.ADVANTAGE as 'POST_ADVANTAGE' , c.RESUME_ADVANTAGE as 'RESUME_ADVANTAGE' FROM APPLY a JOIN POST b ON(a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE) JOIN RESUME c ON(a.RESUME_CODE = c.RESUME_CODE) JOIN USER d ON(c.USER_CODE = d.USER_CODE) WHERE a.POST_CODE = ? AND b.HR_ID = ? AND a.APPLY_CANCEL = FALSE
UPDATE APPLY a, POST b SET APPLY_READ = 1 WHERE APPLY_CODE = ? AND a.POST_CODE in (SELECT b.POST_CODE FROM POST b WHERE b.HR_ID = ? )
SELECT b.USER_CODE FROM APPLY a JOIN RESUME b ON(a.RESUME_CODE = b.RESUME_CODE) WHERE a.APPLY_CODE = ?
UPDATE APPLY SET APPLY_YN = ? WHERE APPLY_CODE = ?
INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_REASON , REPORT_DATE , POST_CODE , USER_CODE , D_LIST_CODE ) VALUES ( ? , NOW() , ? , (SELECT USER_CODE FROM RESUME WHERE RESUME_CODE = ?) , LAST_INSERT_ID() )
INSERT INTO DECISION_LIST ( D_LIST_REASON , D_LIST_DATE , ADMIN_ID , DECISION_CODE , D_LIST_TYPE_CODE ) VALUES ( NULL , NULL , NULL , 1 , ? )

SELECT COUNT(a.REPORT_CODE) AS "COUNT" FROM REPORT a JOIN DECISION_LIST b ON(a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE) WHERE a.POST_CODE IN (SELECT f.POST_CODE FROM POST f WHERE f.HR_ID = ?) AND b.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE = 1

SELECT a.REPORT_DATE , a.REPORT_REASON , b.POST_M_NAME , b.POST_TITLE , c.D_LIST_DATE , c.D_LIST_REASON , d.DECISION_STATUS , e.USER_NAME FROM REPORT a JOIN POST b ON(a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE) JOIN DECISION_LIST c ON (a.D_LIST_CODE = c.D_LIST_CODE) JOIN DECISION d ON(c.DECISION_CODE = d.DECISION_CODE) JOIN USER e ON(a.USER_CODE = e.USER_CODE) WHERE a.POST_CODE IN (SELECT f.POST_CODE FROM POST f WHERE f.HR_ID = ?) AND c.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE = 1 LIMIT ?,?
SELECT a.USER_NAME FROM USER a JOIN RESUME b ON(a.USER_CODE = b.USER_CODE) WHERE b.RESUME_CODE = ?
update POST_AD_PAYMENT SET POST_AD_DATE = now() , POST_AD_PAID = ? , P_METHOD_CODE = ? WHERE POST_AD_CODE = ?

SELECT b.B_NAME , b.B_LOGO , (SELECT COUNT(a.APPLY_CODE) FROM APPLY a JOIN POST b ON(a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE) JOIN RESUME c ON(a.RESUME_CODE = c.RESUME_CODE) WHERE b.HR_ID = ? AND a.APPLY_CANCEL = FALSE) as 지원자수 , (SELECT count(POST_CODE) FROM POST p WHERE HR_ID = ? group by HR_ID) as 공고수 , (SELECT count(POST_CODE) as '진행중인 공고' FROM POST p JOIN DECISION_LIST dl ON (dl.D_LIST_CODE = p.D_LIST_CODE) JOIN DECISION d ON (dl.DECISION_CODE = d.DECISION_CODE) WHERE HR_ID = ? AND DATEDIFF(now(), p.POST_END) < 0 AND dl.DECISION_CODE = 2) as '진행중인 공고 수' FROM BUSINESS b JOIN HR h ON (h.B_CODE = b.B_CODE) JOIN POST p ON (h.HR_ID = p.HR_ID) WHERE p.HR_ID = ? group by b.B_NAME
INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_REASON , REPORT_DATE , POST_CODE , USER_CODE , D_LIST_CODE ) VALUES ( ? , NOW() , ? , (SELECT USER_CODE FROM RESUME WHERE RESUME_CODE = ?) , LAST_INSERT_ID() )
SELECT HR_ID , HR_PHONE FROM HR WHERE HR_ID = ?
update HR SET VERIFIED_NUM = ? WHERE HR_ID = ?
SELECT VERIFIED_NUM FROM HR WHERE HR_ID = ?
update HR SET HR_PWD = ? WHERE HR_ID = ?

SELECT a.POST_CODE , a.POST_M_NAME , a.POST_TITLE , a.POST_DATE , a.POST_START , a.POST_END , b.JOB_NAME , c.INDUSTRY_NAME , CEIL ((DATEDIFF(a.POST_END, a.POST_START)+1) / 7) as "WEEKS" FROM POST a JOIN JOB b ON(a.JOB_CODE = b.JOB_CODE) JOIN INDUSTRY c ON(b.INDUSTRY_CODE = c.INDUSTRY_CODE) JOIN DECISION_LIST d ON(a.D_LIST_CODE = d.D_LIST_CODE) WHERE a.HR_ID = ? AND d.DECISION_CODE = 1
